item.description:
The super-ultra ninja samurai extraordinary master Steve (ok, just a 3rd degree black belt, but hey - that's still impressive), will be hosting a self-defense seminar.

This is an excellent idea for those of you who could use a brush-up on your street-smarts, or for those of you who are street-stupid.

This isn't a karate class, so no need to wear headgear, but dress comfortably so you can practice some moves without bunching in unfortunate areas. Plan about two hours of your time, during which Steve will cover: basic awareness, escapes and counter-attacks (yes!).

Don't let your Cinco de Mayo hangover jeopardize your life. Be here. Save yourself.

Steve is your contact: 203.954.9362
item.name: Self-Defense Seminar by our very own Steve!
